snippet: An Atlanta man accused of threatening the staff of U.S. Rep. John Lewis is set to appear in court for a hearing to decide whether he'll continue to be held in custody....

headline.main: North Korea Launch Could Be Test of New Attack Strategy, Japan Analysts Say
headline.print_headline: North Korea Launch Could Be Test of New Attack Strategy, Japan Analysts Say

lead_paragraph: An Atlanta man accused of threatening the staff of U.S. Rep. John Lewis is set to appear in court for a hearing to decide whether he'll continue to be held in custody.
